info: Recreate by extracting output in kuttl test 'kubectl test --test metrics-no-auth'

metrics.description: Number of currently used workers per controller.
metrics.name: controller_runtime_active_workers

metrics.description: Maximum number of concurrent reconciles per controller.
metrics.name: controller_runtime_max_concurrent_reconciles

metrics.description: Total number of reconciliation errors per controller.
metrics.name: controller_runtime_reconcile_errors_total

metrics.description: Length of time per reconciliation per controller.
metrics.name: controller_runtime_reconcile_time_seconds

metrics.description: Total number of reconciliations per controller.
metrics.name: controller_runtime_reconcile_total

metrics.name: controller_runtime_webhook_latency_seconds

metrics.description: Current number of admission requests being served.
metrics.name: controller_runtime_webhook_requests_in_flight

metrics.description: Total number of admission requests by HTTP status code.
metrics.name: controller_runtime_webhook_requests_total

metrics.description: A summary of the pause duration of garbage collection cycles.
metrics.name: go_gc_duration_seconds

metrics.description: Number of goroutines that currently exist.
metrics.name: go_goroutines

metrics.description: Information about the Go environment.
metrics.name: go_info

metrics.description: Number of bytes allocated and still in use.
metrics.name: go_memstats_alloc_bytes

metrics.description: Total number of bytes allocated, even if freed.
metrics.name: go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total

metrics.description: Number of bytes used by the profiling bucket hash table.
metrics.name: go_memstats_buck_hash_sys_bytes

metrics.description: Total number of frees.
metrics.name: go_memstats_frees_total

metrics.description: Number of bytes used for garbage collection system metadata.
metrics.name: go_memstats_gc_sys_bytes

metrics.description: Number of heap bytes allocated and still in use.
metrics.name: go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes

metrics.description: Number of heap bytes waiting to be used.
metrics.name: go_memstats_heap_idle_bytes

metrics.description: Number of heap bytes that are in use.
metrics.name: go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes

metrics.description: Number of allocated objects.
metrics.name: go_memstats_heap_objects

metrics.description: Number of heap bytes released to OS.
metrics.name: go_memstats_heap_released_bytes

metrics.description: Number of heap bytes obtained from system.
metrics.name: go_memstats_heap_sys_bytes

metrics.description: Number of seconds since 1970 of last garbage collection.
metrics.name: go_memstats_last_gc_time_seconds

metrics.description: Total number of pointer lookups.
metrics.name: go_memstats_lookups_total

metrics.description: Total number of mallocs.
metrics.name: go_memstats_mallocs_total

metrics.description: Number of bytes in use by mcache structures.
metrics.name: go_memstats_mcache_inuse_bytes

metrics.description: Number of bytes used for mcache structures obtained from system.
metrics.name: go_memstats_mcache_sys_bytes

metrics.description: Number of bytes in use by mspan structures.
metrics.name: go_memstats_mspan_inuse_bytes

metrics.description: Number of bytes used for mspan structures obtained from system.
metrics.name: go_memstats_mspan_sys_bytes

metrics.description: Number of heap bytes when next garbage collection will take place.
metrics.name: go_memstats_next_gc_bytes

metrics.description: Number of bytes used for other system allocations.
metrics.name: go_memstats_other_sys_bytes

metrics.name: go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes

metrics.description: Number of bytes obtained from system for stack allocator.
metrics.name: go_memstats_stack_sys_bytes

metrics.description: Number of bytes obtained from system.
metrics.name: go_memstats_sys_bytes

metrics.description: Number of OS threads created.
metrics.name: go_threads

metrics.description: Total user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
metrics.name: process_cpu_seconds_total

metrics.description: Maximum number of open file descriptors.
metrics.name: process_max_fds

metrics.description: Number of open file descriptors.
metrics.name: process_open_fds

metrics.description: Resident memory size in bytes.
metrics.name: process_resident_memory_bytes

metrics.description: Start time of the process since unix epoch in seconds.
metrics.name: process_start_time_seconds

metrics.description: Virtual memory size in bytes.
metrics.name: process_virtual_memory_bytes

metrics.description: Maximum amount of virtual memory available in bytes.
metrics.name: process_virtual_memory_max_bytes

metrics.description: The number of times we attempted a full cluster restart.
metrics.name: vertica_cluster_restart_attempted_total

metrics.description: The number of times we failed when attempting a full cluster restart.
metrics.name: vertica_cluster_restart_failed_total

metrics.description: The number of seconds it took to do a full cluster restart.
metrics.name: vertica_cluster_restart_seconds

metrics.description: The number of times we attempted to restart down nodes.
metrics.name: vertica_nodes_restart_attempted_total

metrics.description: The number of times we failed when trying to restart down nodes.
metrics.name: vertica_nodes_restart_failed_total

metrics.description: The number of seconds it took to restart down nodes.
metrics.name: vertica_nodes_restart_seconds

metrics.description: The number of nodes that have a running pod associated with it.
metrics.name: vertica_running_nodes_count

metrics.description: The number of subclusters that exist.
metrics.name: vertica_subclusters_count

metrics.description: The number of nodes that currently exist.
metrics.name: vertica_total_nodes_count

metrics.description: The number of nodes that have vertica running and can accept connections.
metrics.name: vertica_up_nodes_count

metrics.description: The number of times the operator performed an upgrade caused by an image change.
metrics.name: vertica_upgrade_total

metrics.description: Total number of adds handled by workqueue.
metrics.name: workqueue_adds_total

metrics.description: Current depth of workqueue.
metrics.name: workqueue_depth

metrics.description: How many seconds has the longest running processor for workqueue been running.
metrics.name: workqueue_longest_running_processor_seconds

metrics.description: How long in seconds an item stays in workqueue before being requested.
metrics.name: workqueue_queue_duration_seconds

metrics.description: Total number of retries handled by workqueue.
metrics.name: workqueue_retries_total

metrics.description: How many seconds of work has been done that is in progress and hasn't been observed by work_duration. Large values indicate stuck threads. One can deduce the number of stuck threads by observing the rate at which this increases.
metrics.name: workqueue_unfinished_work_seconds

metrics.description: How long in seconds processing an item from workqueue takes.
metrics.name: workqueue_work_duration_seconds
